# Zeus Quantity Input Number Component

Input Number component, with user-friendly increment and decrement controls

## Features

- ðŸ”¥ set max value
- ðŸ”¥ set min value
- ðŸ”¥ add inline heading
- ðŸ”¥ stacked icons for increment and decrement
